p: MDA-MB-231 cells were seeded into 6-well plates at a density of 500 cells/well and incubated for 24 h. Cells were treated with MOL extract or its derived fractions for 24 h and the plates were then cultured for 14 days in complete DMEM. After 14 days, cells were fixed with 10% neutral formalin and stained with 0.5% crystal violet to visualize colonies and photographed.
